text: @NikkiHaley Trump, what is wrong with you. We want to know how and when you will get our Economy fully open. The coronavirus is over so stop talking about it, you saved 2.2 million lives, admit you were lied too, & talk about getting the business open up. Hydroxychloroquine & zinc cold drugs
